fields.description:
Update css to purge HPE colors and use DXC colors
Update copyright and logo in footer
fields.summary: Console rebranding: change css and footer

comments.body: I wonder if we can leverage this palette where the brand guidelines don't offer enough colors? https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_names.asp

I just looked over the branch. I like where this is going. I notice checkboxes are blue and that seems out of place. Another thing are graph lines. When running showing multiple series, the 3rd looks almost black. If that could become a color, it would probably look better.
Pulling back to in progress for a few follow-up tweaks
Pulling out of QA for minor tag editor style fixes.
Minor tag editor style fixes are at https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/2205

I've attached an image that illustrates differences across item-lists (as we call them in the sass).
If this latest change was to try unifying those appearances, I think there may be more work to be done.
We can talk about whether this is outside the scope of the re-branding.

[~dkavanagh]: PR 2205 unifies the styles of the tag-like list items, including security group rules, standard tags, autoscaling tags, S3 ACLs, and S3 metadata items.  The screenshot you added is exactly how those items should look.

[~dkavanagh]: What inconsistencies are you observing with the tag-like items (if any)?  Or if you are referring to other inconsistencies, could you elaborate here?  If there are glaring inconsistencies, we could fix them in 4.4.1 or 5.0, perhaps in a separate ticket.
[~kgill], do you agree that the items in the attached image are not consistently styled? Do you think they should be?
[~dkavanagh]: Transitional status color tweaks and table header font updates are in https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/2207
